verses.name: John 1:37
verses.text: And the two disciples heard him speak, and they followed Jesus.

verses.name: John 1:38
verses.text: Then Jesus turned, and saw them following, and saith unto them, What seek ye? They said unto him, Rabbi, (which is to say, being interpreted, Master,) where dwellest thou?

verses.name: John 1:39
verses.text: He saith unto them, Come and see. They came and saw where he dwelt, and abode with him that day: for it was about the tenth hour.

verses.name: John 1:40
verses.text: One of the two which heard John speak, and followed him, was Andrew, Simon Peter’s brother.
